q_ch: 使用 Silk 的缝纫任务有哪些？

steps.sql: SELECT st.id FROM sewing_tasks st JOIN sewing_material_allocation sma ON st.id = sma.sewing_task_id JOIN warehouse_material wm ON sma.warehouse_material_id = wm.id JOIN materials m ON wm.material_id = m.id WHERE m.name = 'Silk';
steps.description: To find sewing tasks that use the material 'Silk', we need to identify the warehouse_material_id for 'Silk', then find the sewing tasks that have allocated this material.

response:
Sure thing! Here are the sewing tasks that use the material 'Silk':

| Sewing Task ID |
|----------------|
| 11             |
| 12             |
| 13             |
| 14             |

These tasks are all about that silky smooth touch! 🧵✨ If you have any more questions, feel free to ask! 😄
